entries.text: Thank you for calling Tech Solutions. Please briefly describe your issue.
My computer keeps crashing! I get this awful blue screen and I've already spoken to someone who couldn't fix it!
Transferring you to the next available agent.
Thank you for calling Tech Solutions, my name is John. How can I help you today?
I just said! My computer keeps crashing! It's a brand new machine and I think there's a hardware failure. I get a blue screen with some cryptic error code.
Okay, I understand. Can you tell me the error code you're seeing on the blue screen?
It's something like 0x0000007E or something similar. I don't know, it flashes by too quickly! The last person I talked to told me to reinstall Windows and I did, and it STILL crashes!

I see. Since you've already reinstalled Windows and the issue persists, this sounds like it might require some advanced troubleshooting. Let me transfer you to our tier 2 support. They have more specialized tools to diagnose potential hardware issues.
Tier 2? I've already wasted an hour on this! Fine, transfer me.
One moment please...
Transferring you to a Tier 2 specialist.
Hello, this is Sarah, a technical specialist with Tech Solutions. How can I help you today?

Oh, here we go again. I have a brand new computer that keeps crashing. I suspect a hardware failure, and I keep getting a blue screen with a different error code each time! I've already reinstalled Windows, and the first guy couldn't help. I was told this is Tier 2. So can you actually fix it?
I understand your frustration. Let's try to get to the bottom of this. To start, could you describe the circumstances surrounding the crashes? What programs are you running when the error occurs?
It's random! Sometimes it happens when I'm just browsing the web. Other times it's when I'm playing a game. There doesn't seem to be any pattern. I told the other guy everything I could think of.
Okay. Have you run any hardware diagnostics? Perhaps a memory test or a hard drive check?
Look, I don't know how to do that! I'm not a computer expert. That's why I called you guys! I paid good money for this computer and it doesn't even work!
I understand. We can guide you through the process. First, we'll need to access the BIOS menu during startup. To do this, you'll need to restart your computer...
Restart my computer? Are you serious? I've already restarted it like a hundred times! This is ridiculous. I want a refund!
I understand you're frustrated. While I can't directly process a refund, I can continue assisting you with troubleshooting this issue. Let's focus on the hardware...
No! I'm done. This is a waste of time. I'm hanging up. I want to speak to a manager!
Sir, please wait! We can...
